greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Completely multiplicative with a(p) = p * a(p-1) for any prime number p.
comment: All terms are distinct and belong to A064522.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) >= n with equality iff n is a power of 2.
a(n) is a multiple of n.
a(n) is a multiple of A000010(n).
program: (PARI) a(n) = my (f=factor(n), p=f[,1]~, e=f[,2]~); prod (i=1, #p, (p[i] * a(p[i] - 1))^e[i])
results.author: _Rémy Sigrist_, Jul 17 2019
